name: Blowfish
description:
Open world RPG created by my discord server, https://discord.gg/G5SQ8u42P Devlogs will reveal what was newly added, so keep track there.

Controls (atm, subject to change)

WASD: move (adapts to different layouts, so ZQSD works on AZERTY)

Space: jump

Shift: sprint

Click: shoot

Right Click: zoom

E: pickup

Pg Up/Pg Down: cycle weapons up or down
